name: claude-plugin-marketplace
description: A curated collection of Claude skills and plugins for enhancing your Claude Code experience

plugins.name: deep-reading-framework
plugins.description: Three-pass critical reading framework for systematic document analysis

plugins.name: oss-contribution-framework
plugins.description: Systematic 6-phase framework for contributing to open source projects from issue discovery to PR creation

plugins.name: oss-issue-discovery
plugins.description: Phase 1: Find and evaluate suitable OSS issues matching your skills and goals

plugins.name: oss-issue-analysis
plugins.description: Phase 2: Deep analysis of issue requirements, scope, and expected outcomes

plugins.name: oss-codebase-exploration
plugins.description: Phase 3: Understand project structure, conventions, and architecture

plugins.name: oss-issue-code-mapping
plugins.description: Phase 4: Connect issue requirements to specific code locations

plugins.name: oss-solution-implementation
plugins.description: Phase 5: Implement solution following project standards and best practices

plugins.name: oss-documentation-pr
plugins.description: Phase 6: Document changes and create comprehensive pull request
